discussion.author: dpsanders
discussion.text: Please write out the abbreviation in the package name.

discussion.author: tmigot
discussion.text: Thank you for the feedback. DCI is actually the name of the algorithm proposed in a research paper [Bielschowsky, R. H., & Gomes, F. A. (2008)](https://doi.org/10.1007/s10589-020-00201-2) and stands for "Dynamic Control of Infeasibility", which is probably too long. We decided to rename it DCISolver and open a new PR #33426.

discussion.author: dpsanders
discussion.text: I think DynamicControlOfInfeasibility.jl would be a good name personally. You only type the name once and you can tab complete.
